singleItemContent: How long have you been living there?
Do you think you continue living there for a long time?
How has your town changed over the last 20 years?
Describe a time when you shared something with others (or another person)
And explain how you felt about sharing it
What are the consequences if children dont like to share?
How do you feel about sharing accommodation with others on campus?
How could parents and teachers teach young children to share?
